languages.text: Жрец Говорящий-со-Звездами может провести ритуал усмирения леса, если ему удастся отыскать дорогу в родное поселение.

traits.locale_text: Население Кетца-аль Хета веками выживало в лесах благодаря особым ритуалам. Жрец Говорящий-со-Звездами может провести ритуал усмирения леса, если ему удасться отыскать дорогу в родное поселение.

languages.text: The priest Speaks-With-Gods can perform a ritual that will cleanse the forest — as soon as he finds his way back to his home settlement.
languages.original_text: Жрец Говорящий-со-Звездами может провести ритуал усмирения леса, если ему удастся отыскать дорогу в родное поселение.

traits.locale_text: The priest Speaks-With-Gods can perform a ritual that will cleanse the forest — as soon as he finds his way back to his home settlement.
The priest Speaks-With-Gods can perform a ritual that will cleanse the forest — as soon as he finds his way back to his home settlement.
The priest Speaks-With-Gods can perform a ritual that will cleanse the forest — as soon as he finds his way back to his home settlement.
The priest Speaks-With-Gods can perform a ritual that will cleanse the forest — as soon as he finds his way back to his home settlement.

languages.text: Le prêtre Parle-aux-Dieux peut accomplir un rituel de purification de la forêt... Du moins, dès qu'il aura trouvé un moyen de retourner à son village.
languages.original_text: The priest Speaks-With-Gods can perform a ritual that will cleanse the forest — as soon as he finds his way back to his home settlement.

traits.locale_text: Le prêtre Parle-aux-Dieux peut accomplir un rituel de purification de la forêt... Du moins, dès qu'il aura trouvé un moyen de retourner à son village.

languages.text: “神谕”牧师可以举行安抚森林的仪式。只要他返回村子，就可以立刻举行这场仪式。
languages.original_text: The priest Speaks-With-Gods can perform a ritual that will cleanse the forest — as soon as he finds his way back to his home settlement.

traits.locale_text: “神谕”牧师可以举行安抚森林的仪式。只要他返回村子，就可以立刻举行这场仪式。

languages.text: 神々との語り部である司祭であれば、故郷である集落に戻る道が見つかり次第、森を清める儀式を執り行うことができる。
languages.original_text: The priest Speaks-With-Gods can perform a ritual that will cleanse the forest — as soon as he finds his way back to his home settlement.

traits.locale_text: 神々との語り部である司祭であれば、故郷である集落に戻る道が見つかり次第、森を清める儀式を執り行うことができる。

languages.text: Der Priester Spricht-mit-den-Göttern kann den Wald durch ein Ritual läutern — sobald er den Weg zurück zu seiner Siedlung gefunden hat.
languages.original_text: The priest Speaks-With-Gods can perform a ritual that will cleanse the forest — as soon as he finds his way back to his home settlement.

traits.locale_text: Der Priester Spricht-mit-den-Göttern kann den Wald durch ein Ritual läutern — sobald er den Weg zurück zu seiner Siedlung gefunden hat.

languages.text: El sacerdote Habla-con-Dioses puede celebrar un ritual que purificará el bosque... en cuanto encuentre el camino de vuelta a su asentamiento.
languages.original_text: The priest Speaks-With-Gods can perform a ritual that will cleanse the forest — as soon as he finds his way back to his home settlement.

traits.locale_text: El sacerdote Habla-con-Dioses puede celebrar un ritual que purificará el bosque... en cuanto encuentre el camino de vuelta a su asentamiento.

languages.text: Rahip Tanrıların Dili, ormanı temizleyecek bir ayin gerçekleştirebilir. Tabii evinin bulunduğu yerleşim yerine giden yolu bulduktan sonra.
languages.original_text: The priest Speaks-With-Gods can perform a ritual that will cleanse the forest — as soon as he finds his way back to his home settlement.
